thread.title: Silver foxy: Phillip Schofield dances in STOCKINGS and heels as he embraces feminine side for Ant & Dec
thread.title_full: Silver foxy: Phillip Schofield dances in STOCKINGS and heels as he embraces feminine side for Ant & Dec

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Silver foxy: Phillip Schofield dances in STOCKINGS and heels as he embraces feminine side for Ant & Dec
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Phillip Schofield shows off his silver fox-y side on Saturday Night Takeaway this weekend as he performs a racy routine for Ant & Dec. 
The telly host teams up with his fellow This Morning presenter Holly Willoughby in a brand new skit Make 'Em Laugh, with the pair battling the Geordie duo to make them do just that. 
It's that simple - and despite the stars' best efforts, everyone remains in the game, just about managing to keep a straight face. Phillip shows off his cheeky side (Photo: ITV) Silver foxy, right there (Photo: ITV) Even Holly struggles to hold it together (Photo: ITV) 
That could all change when Phillip appears in a tiny red skirt, matching high heels and a pair of stockings. Read More 
Ant & Dec looks mortified as even Holly struggling to keep it together. The duo have to hold it together (Photo: ITV) Do they make it through the task? (Photo: ITV) The game's called Make 'Em Laugh (Photo: ITV) 
"Eyes up," he quips after cheekily bending over. "Because I'm gonna dance for you..." Read More 
Ant McPartlin yells: "That's disgusting!" They all have a go at making the other pair laugh (Photo: ITV) Ant & Dec bring their best (Photo: ITV) 
Both duos try their best in the task, with Ant dressing up as Holly while Dec Donnelly does his best impersonation of Phillip. 
Meanwhile, Holly gives it her best shot as she paints a pretty risque portrait of her TV co-star. 
* Ant & Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway airs this weekend at 7.30pm on ITV Like us on Facebook
